title: Gov Ortom extends amnesty programme
content:
From Uche Uche, Makurdi Benue State Governor Samuel Ortom has announced the extension of the amnesty program to enable groups another opportunity to continue to key into the amnesty program and surrender illegal arms and ammunition in their possession. The governor who announced the extension during a chat with newsmen at the Peoples’ House, where he received over 84 weapons willingly surrendered by a dreaded and most wanted militia leader in the State Terwase Agwaza aka Gana said the period of the amnesty has been extended to four(4) weeks.
